poem:
"An Ode to the Rebirth of Gladiators"

A farewell to old,
Hello to the new,
Rebooted in vigour,
Gladiators, it's you.

Nitro, Diamond, Fire,
Names kindled by desire,
A battle not of flesh,
But a spirit tending higher.

Bradley, Barney at helm,
A kinship in the realm,
The screen's modern Colosseum,
Innocent hearts overwhelm.

Oh, these games they play,
In the dying light of day,
Burdened with laughter, they say,
Our childhoods, in disarray.
